title: Big Wild Fire | Cleaning Clearing & Burning Brush In Preparation Of Planting Corn Crops

tasks.task: Walking and operating a farm tractor
subtasks: Stepping into the tractor seat
Sitting and starting the tractor engine
Manipulating the joystick to steer the tractor
Accelerating and decelerating the tractor using the gas pedal and brakes
Applying the parking brake
Checking the rearview mirror while moving the tractor

tasks.task: Driving a tractor pulled by two horses
subtasks: Observing the horses' pace and adjusting the speed accordingly
Managing the reins to control the horses
Nudging the horses with the reins if necessary
Attaching a soybean picker harvester to the tractor
Operating the hydraulic system to lower the harvester
Monitoring the grain bin fill level during harvest
Periodically stopping to unload grain from the bin
Transporting wheat to the storage shed using a tractor and wagon
Unloading the wheat from the wagon into the storage bins
Covering the stored wheat with plastic sheeting to protect from moisture

tasks.task: Walking and operating a farm tractor
Harvesting soybeans with a picker harvester

subtasks: So yeah, I think this covers the physical tasks from the transcript. Let me write them out again with the MAINTASKs and SUBTASKs.
